content.webTitle: Dell: Home is where the PC is

fields.headline: Dell: Home is where the PC is
fields.bodyText: "The PC is becoming more and more the center of the entertainment experience," Dell said during a 45-minute question-and-answer session at the conference. "The PC is not just a computing device--it's entertainment, it's music, it's videos and it's television." The story is here. More in a conference call later today (Thursday).
